title: Simon Wardley OSCON 2014 Keynote: "Introduction to Value Chain Mapping"
description: From OSCON 2014: "Anticipating the Future: An Introduction to Value Chain Mapping." Apparently we are living through a time of disruptive innovation, with the creation of new value and the destruction of old norms.
